Today, we welcome @RosalindeEU @EUScienceInnov as the Chair of the #CleanAviation Governing Board and Sabine Klauke @Airbus as Co-Chair, as well as our new Members!
 
We look forward to working together to make #ClimateNeutral aviation a reality! ‚úàÔ∏è
 
‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/NphEzGPG0f https://t.co/r0COWBFiQS

Delighted that some could join us in person for the first governing board, in addition to those attending virtually!

#StrongerTogether https://t.co/o2eMpfNKt6

El director general de la @AeroCivilCol, Jair Orlando Fajardo, @jairfajardo2, se reuni√≥ con representantes delegados de EASA del departamento de cooperaci√≥n internacional para la formalizaci√≥n del proyecto EU-LAC APP y el Acuerdo institucional de trabajo entre EASA. https://t.co/fooEhNClOp

üì¢Clean Aviation has landed!üõ¨

#CleanAviation is the world's most ambitious #research & #innovation partnership for a sustainable aviation sector, and a key stepping stone on Europe's path to #ClimateNeutrality by 2050.üá™üá∫

Discover our brand-new website!‚û°Ô∏èhttps://t.co/mwl3TNFpgM https://t.co/54FR8HHang
